item.entity_flask.empty2: Please capture the actual mob you cheater!
text.forcecraft.fortune0: You aren't supposed to eat me.
text.forcecraft.fortune1: Beauty is in the eye of the tiger.
text.forcecraft.fortune3: Which came first, the chicken or the chunk?
text.forcecraft.fortune7: If a tree falls down in the woods, you have a special mod installed.
text.forcecraft.fortune8: The cake is a lie of omission.
text.forcecraft.fortune9: A wise man once said, "Yes honey, it does make you look fat."  He never said that again.
text.forcecraft.fortune10: Don't stare directly at the pixels.
text.forcecraft.fortune14: What you seek is surrounded by blocks.
text.forcecraft.fortune15: Today is Tuesday, or is it Friday - I can never tell.
text.forcecraft.fortune16: In the event of a creeper explosion, your keyboard can double as a broken keyboard.
text.forcecraft.fortune18: You are 5.6 grams heavier than you were 10 seconds ago.
text.forcecraft.fortune21: We're no strangers to love.  You know the rules and so do I.
text.forcecraft.fortune23: I CAN believe it's not butter.
text.forcecraft.fortune24: Beware enderman with a short fuse...
text.forcecraft.fortune26: Every rose has its bounding box.
text.forcecraft.fortune29: Great, now you've spoiled your dinner!
text.forcecraft.fortune31: Not all Blocks are created equal.
text.forcecraft.fortune34: Look in your inventory, now back to me - this fortune is now diamonds!
text.forcecraft.fortune36: Winners never cheat and cheaters never win, unless the winners cheated, in which case the cheaters won.
text.forcecraft.fortune37: Hi Bob!  What, they can't all be zingers.
text.forcecraft.fortune38: Have you ever thought to yourself, "My, that's an awfully large open grave!"
text.forcecraft.fortune39: Could you pick up my dry-cleaning?
text.forcecraft.fortune40: Never shower in a thunderstorm.  It's less efficient than bathing indoors and you'll freak out your neighbors.
text.forcecraft.fortune41: It is said that everyone experiences hardships, but God must REALLY hate YOU.
text.forcecraft.fortune42: If you play a country song backwards, you waste about 4 minutes of your life listening to garbled nonsense.
text.forcecraft.fortune43: No, you can't make that jump.
text.forcecraft.fortune44: I know they're furry and cuddly, but trust me, they're evil incarnate.
text.forcecraft.fortune46: I see the land, but where exactly are the tracts?
text.forcecraft.fortune47: Creepers were originally from Dr. Who.
text.forcecraft.fortune50: Don't make me come back there!
text.forcecraft.fortune51: I've burned everything that reminds me of you in a ritualistic bonfire.
text.forcecraft.fortune52: We will be an unstoppable force; to our enemies we bring only death, to our allies we always bring cake.
text.forcecraft.fortune53: Heavy is the head that eats the crayons.
text.forcecraft.fortune56: Goodness and love will always win!
text.forcecraft.fortune57: I told you not to eat that!
text.forcecraft.fortune61: It's a wonder you get anything done!
text.forcecraft.fortune62: You will find happiness with a new love: Minecraft's latest patch.
text.forcecraft.fortune63: Seriously, who is in charge of the song/cowbell ratio?
text.forcecraft.fortune64: It's not a bug, it's a "feature."
text.forcecraft.fortune65: Do you really need this many cookies?
text.forcecraft.fortune67: I wanted to be a newspaper.
text.forcecraft.fortune68: Thank you!  It was really dark in there!
text.forcecraft.fortune69: Thank you for not eating me.
text.forcecraft.fortune71: That's the biggest flapjack I've ever seen!
text.forcecraft.fortune75: If all else fails use fire.
text.forcecraft.fortune76: Dig it!  Dig it!  Dig to the center of the earth!
text.forcecraft.fortune77: No!  Not into the pit!  It BURNS!
text.forcecraft.fortune78: Dawn of the First Day, 72 hours remain.
text.forcecraft.fortune79: Don't stare directly at the potato.
text.forcecraft.fortune86: I hear 'Innards of the Machine' is on tour.
text.forcecraft.fortune88: The capital of The Ukraine is Kiev.
text.forcecraft.fortune95: Leave me alone for a bit, okay?
text.forcecraft.fortune98: My summer home is a no-bake.
text.forcecraft.fortune100: The night is young, but you are not.
text.forcecraft.fortune104: Never eat an entire chocolate bunny in one sitting.
text.forcecraft.fortune109: Inertia is a property of mallard.
text.forcecraft.fortune111: If you can read this, you're literate.
text.forcecraft.fortune114: Please head in an orderly fashion to the disintegration chamber.
text.forcecraft.fortune118: If the shoe fits, you probably own it.
text.forcecraft.fortune123: Why is Count Chocula seasonal?  Pedophilic vampires are always in style!
text.forcecraft.fortune127: Success is often preceded by failure, then followed again by failure.
text.forcecraft.fortune128: Man with Steve skin receive no cake.
text.forcecraft.fortune131: This is the word of Notch.
text.forcecraft.fortune132: Don't attack the cute little endermen - you'll be sorry.
text.forcecraft.fortune133: I miss my sanity, but then again I never used it.
text.forcecraft.fortune134: So this is where germs are born!
text.forcecraft.fortune138: You can do anything at Zombo.com.
text.forcecraft.fortune140: TROGDOR was a man.  I mean, he was a dragon-man...  Maybe he was just a dragon.
text.forcecraft.fortune141: Charles in charge of our clicks left and right.  Charles in charge of every block in sight.
text.forcecraft.fortune142: Charles was never really in charge.
text.forcecraft.fortune143: Remember to use every part of the chicken.
text.forcecraft.fortune145: Every 10 minutes another crappy fortune is written.
text.forcecraft.fortune146: How many licks does it take to get to the center of a Chuck Norris?
text.forcecraft.fortune148: DO NOT feed the beast!  (After midnight)
text.forcecraft.fortune152: If you program for more than 20 hours straight, do not blink.
text.forcecraft.fortune153: Ceiling cat is watching you procrastinate.
text.forcecraft.fortune154: Get your hand off my thigh!  You can have the leg.
text.forcecraft.fortune158: Endermen can move TNT.  I'm serious.
text.forcecraft.fortune159: Aww, you got blood all over my new sword!
text.forcecraft.fortune160: The human pancreas can take only so many twinkies.
text.forcecraft.fortune161: Humus is something you eat when you want your innards to cry.
text.forcecraft.fortune171: Have you heard the one about the Rabbi and the Priest?  Oh I forgot, you're deaf.
text.forcecraft.fortune172: There are worse appendages to get caught sticking inside the cookie jar.
text.forcecraft.fortune173: Ever have the feeling you're being watched?  That's me!
text.forcecraft.fortune174: He who handles his NullPointerExceptions is a wise man indeed.
text.forcecraft.fortune175: Taking candy from a baby often prevents choking.
text.forcecraft.fortune176: Texting while driving is a potent form of natural-selection.
text.forcecraft.fortune177: The secret to a good marriage is matching tattoos.
text.forcecraft.fortune178: A sucker is born every minute, however an idiot is born every two seconds.
text.forcecraft.fortune179: Error in Thread Main: ExceptionNotCaughtException: ForceCraft.java:32
text.forcecraft.fortune181: Daydreaming is free, cookies are not.
text.forcecraft.fortune184: You do not aim Yo-Yos at people.  They should face the ground.
text.forcecraft.fortune185: A Yo-Yo isn't a tool for hurting people...
commands.forcecraft.null: Second argument must be a valid command:
commands.forcecraft.failed: Command failed, ensure you have permission
gui.forcecraft.infuser.missing.tooltip: Upgrade Tome or Center Slot empty
gui.forcecraft.infuser.tooltip.pack1: Upgrade the force pack to 16 slots
gui.forcecraft.infuser.tooltip.pack2: Upgrade the force pack to 24 slots
gui.forcecraft.infuser.tooltip.pack3: Upgrade the force pack to 32 slots
gui.forcecraft.infuser.tooltip.pack4: Upgrade the force pack to the maximum 40 slots
gui.forcecraft.infuser.tooltip.rainbow: Get random wool from sheep using shears
gui.forcecraft.infuser.tooltip.speed: Add speed to armor or the force rod
gui.forcecraft.infuser.tooltip.lumberjac: Lumberjack on your axe will chop the whole tree
item.forcecraft.book.name: Force and You
info.forcecraft.book.subtitle: For all your Force needs
info.forcecraft.book.landing: ForceCraft is a mod focused around a power called "Force". $(br)Here you'll learn how to use it.
info.forcecraft.book.infuser.name: Infuser
info.forcecraft.book.infuser.desc: The power of Force is used while infusing. $(br)To do so you'll have to get yourself an $(item)Infuser$()
info.forcecraft.book.infuser.entry.name: Infuser
info.forcecraft.book.infuser_info.text: With the $(item)Infuser$() you can start exploring the infusions that can be applied.
With the $(item)Force Furnace$() you can smelt blocks and items similar to a vanilla furnace but twice as fast.$(br)The furnace can be upgraded by applying an Upgrade Core of choice into the Upgrade slot on the top left. (Once an upgrade is applied taking it out will void it)
info.forcecraft.book.force_furnace_speed: The $(item)Speed Core$() will increase the furnace speed fivefold.
info.forcecraft.book.force_furnace_heat_: The $(item)Heat Core$() will increase the furnace efficiency by twofold, allowing you to smelt twice the amount of items/blocks with the same amount of fuel.
info.forcecraft.book.force_furnace_grind: The $(item)Grinding Core$() will change the furnace into grinding mode. With grinding mode active, you can make use of Grinding recipes.$(br)For example, grinding a single Bone into 5 Bonemeal.
info.forcecraft.book.force_furnace_freez: The $(item)Freezing Core$() will change the furnace into freezing mode. With freezing mode active, you can make use of Freezing recipes.$(br)For example, freezing a Blaze Rod into a Bone.
info.forcecraft.book.force_furnace_exper: The $(item)Experience Core$() will increase the experience that can be obtained from smelting by twofold.
info.forcecraft.book.requirements_info.t: To get started the following items are required:$(br)$(br)Firstly, the $(item)Infuser$() requires power in the form of $(4)RF$().
info.forcecraft.book.requirements_gem.te: The second requirement is $(6)Liquid Force$().$(br)Liquid force is added by inserting $(item)Force Gems$() into the slot above the liquid tank.
info.forcecraft.book.requirements_tome.t: The third requirement is an $(item)Upgrade Tome$() which is required for infusions. Without it the $(item)Infuser$() will not function.
info.forcecraft.book.upgrade_core_info.t: The $(item)Upgrade Core$() can be used to craft $(l:forcecraft:infuser/furnace)$(item)Force Furnace$() upgrade cores. With these you can enhance aspects of the Furnace to suit your needs.
info.forcecraft.book.upgrade_core_recipe: $(l)Note:$() The recipe requires an $(item)Experience Tome$() with at least 100 xp.
info.forcecraft.book.upgrade_core_link.t: You can check the page on the $(l:forcecraft:infuser/upgrade_core)$(item)Upgrade Core$() to learn how to craft it
info.forcecraft.book.tier_0.name: Tier 0 Infusions
info.forcecraft.book.tier_0.desc: Infusions that can be executed by default
info.forcecraft.book.force.entry.name: Force
info.forcecraft.book.force_info.text: This infusion does the following:$(br)$(li)On a $(item)Force Sword$(): Adds one level of Knockback per item
info.forcecraft.book.damage.entry.name: Damage
info.forcecraft.book.damage_info.text: This infusion does the following:$(br)$(li)On a $(item)Force Sword$(): Adds two levels of Sharpness per item$(br)$(li)On a $(item)Force Bow$(): Adds one level of Power per level$(br)$(li)On $(item)Force Armor$(): Increases Force Punch damage by half a heart per item
info.forcecraft.book.tier_1.name: Tier 1 Infusions
info.forcecraft.book.tier_1.desc: Infusions that can be executed by having an $(item)Upgrade Tome$() of at least Tier 1
info.forcecraft.book.speed.entry.name: Speed
info.forcecraft.book.speed_info.text: This infusion does the following:$(br)$(li)On $(item)Force Tools$(): Increases the tool efficiency$(br)$(li)On a $(item)Force Bow$() (Max lvl: 1): Makes arrows fly faster and farther$(br)$(li)On $(item)Force Armor$() (Max lvl: 1): Increase player movement speed
info.forcecraft.book.speed_info.text2: $(li)On an $(l:forcecraft:infuser/upgrade_core)$(item)Upgrade Core$(): Converts the Upgrade Core to an $(item)Experience Core$() to use as an upgrade for the $(l:forcecraft:infuser/furnace)$(item)Force Furnace$()
info.forcecraft.book.lumberjack_info.tex: This infusion does the following:$(br)$(li)On a $(item)Force Axe$(): Breaks every wooden block in a vertical pillar instantly, using twice the durability
info.forcecraft.book.heat.entry.name: Heat
info.forcecraft.book.heat_info.text: This infusion does the following:$(br)$(li)On $(item)Force Tools$(): Attempts to smelt any mined block drop$(br)$(li)On $(item)Force Armor$() (Max lvl: 1): Increases Force Punch damage by half a heart per item and sets mobs on fire
info.forcecraft.book.tier_2.name: Tier 2 Infusions
info.forcecraft.book.tier_2.desc: Infusions that can be executed by having an $(item)Upgrade Tome$() of at least Tier 2
info.forcecraft.book.luck.entry.name: Luck
info.forcecraft.book.luck_info.text: This infusion does the following:$(br)$(li)On $(item)Force Tools$(): Adds one level of Fortune per item$(br)$(li)On a $(item)Force Sword$(): Adds one level of Looting per item$(br)$(li)On a $(item)Force Bow$(): Adds one level of Looting per item which affects ranged kills
info.forcecraft.book.luck_info.text2: $(li)On $(item)Force Armor$() (Max lvl: 1): Increases Force Punch mob drops similar to Looting on weapons
info.forcecraft.book.rainbow.entry.name: Rainbow
info.forcecraft.book.rainbow_info.text: This infusion does the following:$(br)$(li)On $(item)Force Shears$(): Randomly colors Wool dropped from shearing Sheep
info.forcecraft.book.experience_info.tex: This infusion does the following:$(br)$(li)On a $(item)Book$(): Creates an $(item)Experience Tome$()$(br)$(li)On an $(l:forcecraft:infuser/upgrade_core)$(item)Upgrade Core$(): Converts the Upgrade Core to an $(item)Experience Core$() to use as an upgrade for the $(l:forcecraft:infuser/furnace)$(item)Force Furnace$()
info.forcecraft.book.experience_core_inf: This infusion does the following:$(br)$(li)On an $(l:forcecraft:infuser/upgrade_core)$(item)Upgrade Core$(): Converts the Upgrade Core to an $(item)Experience Core$() to use as an upgrade for the $(l:forcecraft:infuser/furnace)$(item)Force Furnace$()
info.forcecraft.book.holding.entry.name: Holding
info.forcecraft.book.holding_info.text: This infusion does the following:$(br)$(li)On a $(item)Force Pack$(): Adds an additional 8 storage slots. Allowing you to upgrade the base $(item)Force Pack$() to 16 slots.
info.forcecraft.book.freezing.entry.name: Freezing
info.forcecraft.book.freezing_info.text: This infusion does the following:$(br)$(li)On a $(item)Force Bow$(): Adds a freezing effect to the arrows
This infusion does the following:$(br)$(li)On an $(l:forcecraft:infuser/upgrade_core)$(item)Upgrade Core$(): Converts the Upgrade Core to an $(item)Freezing Core$() to use as an upgrade for the $(l:forcecraft:infuser/furnace)$(item)Force Furnace$()
This infusion does the following:$(br)$(li)On an $(l:forcecraft:infuser/upgrade_core)$(item)Upgrade Core$(): Converts the Upgrade Core to a $(item)Grinding Core$() to use as an upgrade for the $(l:forcecraft:infuser/furnace)$(item)Force Furnace$()
info.forcecraft.book.speed_core_info.tex: This infusion does the following:$(br)$(li)On an $(l:forcecraft:infuser/upgrade_core)$(item)Upgrade Core$(): Converts the Upgrade Core to a $(item)Speed Core$() to use as an upgrade for the $(l:forcecraft:infuser/furnace)$(item)Force Furnace$()
info.forcecraft.book.tier_3.name: Tier 3 Infusions
info.forcecraft.book.tier_3.desc: Infusions that can be executed by having an $(item)Upgrade Tome$() of at least Tier 3
info.forcecraft.book.holding_2_info.text: This infusion does the following:$(br)$(li)On a $(item)Force Pack$(): Adds an additional 8 storage slots. Allowing you to upgrade the $(item)Force Pack$() to 24 slots.
info.forcecraft.book.bleeding.entry.name: Bleeding
info.forcecraft.book.bleeding_info.text: This infusion does the following:$(br)$(li)On a $(item)Force Sword$(): Will imbue Force Punch with the Bleeding effect$(br)$(li)On a $(item)Force Bow$(): Will imbue the bow's projectiles with Bleeding$(br)$(li)On $(item)Force Armor$(): Will imbue the armor with Bleeding cursing any hit enemy
info.forcecraft.book.bleeding_info.text2: Bleeding inflicts a half of damage twice per second. It lasts one second per cumulated level of Bleeding$(br)Bleeding from different items $(l)will$() stack up to 15 seconds
info.forcecraft.book.camo.entry.name: Camo
info.forcecraft.book.camo_info.text: This infusion does the following:$(br)$(li)On a $(item)Force Rod$(): Will imbue the rod with Invisibility$(br)$(li)On $(item)Force Armor$(): Makes the armor invisible, showing the player's skin instead of the armor
info.forcecraft.book.silk.entry.name: Silky
info.forcecraft.book.silk_info.text: This infusion does the following:$(br)$(li)On $(item)Force Tools$(): Will imbue the tools with Silk Touch
info.forcecraft.book.tier_4.name: Tier 4 Infusions
info.forcecraft.book.tier_4.desc: Infusions that can be executed by having an $(item)Upgrade Tome$() of at least Tier 4
info.forcecraft.book.holding_3_info.text: This infusion does the following:$(br)$(li)On a $(item)Force Pack$(): Adds an additional 8 storage slots. Allowing you to upgrade the $(item)Force Pack$() to 32 slots.
info.forcecraft.book.bane.entry.name: Bane
info.forcecraft.book.bane_info.text: This infusion does the following:$(br)$(li)On a $(item)Force Sword$(): Will imbue the sword with Bane$(br)$(li)On a $(item)Force Bow$(): Will imbue the bow's projectiles with Bane$(br)$(li)On $(item)Force Armor$(): will imbue any projectile fired by a bow with Bane
info.forcecraft.book.bane_info.text2: Bane will permanently remove certain monster abilities, leaving them mostly harmless:$(br)$(li)$(l)Creepers$() hit with bane will lose the ability to blow up$(br)$(li)$(l)Enderman$() and $(l)Ender Tots$() hit with bane will lose the ability to teleport
info.forcecraft.book.heat_upgrade_info.t: This infusion does the following:$(br)$(li)On an $(l:forcecraft:infuser/upgrade_core)$(item)Upgrade Core$(): Converts the Upgrade Core to an $(item)Heat Core$() to use as an upgrade for the $(l:forcecraft:infuser/furnace)$(item)Force Furnace$()
info.forcecraft.book.tier_5.name: Tier 5 Infusions
info.forcecraft.book.tier_5.desc: Infusions that can be executed by having an $(item)Upgrade Tome$() of at least Tier 5
info.forcecraft.book.holding_4_info.text: This infusion does the following:$(br)$(li)On a $(item)Force Pack$(): Adds an additional 8 storage slots. Allowing you to upgrade the $(item)Force Pack$() to 40 slots which is the maximum amount of slots the pack can handle.
info.forcecraft.book.healing.entry.name: Healing
info.forcecraft.book.healing_info.text: This infusion does the following:$(br)$(li)On a $(item)Force Rod$() (Max lvl: 2): Will imbue the rod with Healing
info.forcecraft.book.wing.entry.name: Wing
info.forcecraft.book.wing_info.text: This infusion does the following:$(br)$(li)On a $(item)Force Sword$(): will allow the user to propel themselves forward while using some durability
info.forcecraft.book.tier_6.name: Tier 6 Infusions
info.forcecraft.book.tier_6.desc: Infusions that can be executed by having an $(item)Upgrade Tome$() of at least Tier 6
info.forcecraft.book.time.entry.name: Time
info.forcecraft.book.time_info.text: This infusion does the following:$(br)$(li)On a $(item)Force Torch$(): Imbues the torch with time converting it to a $(item)Time Torch$()$(br)$(br)$(l)Note:$() If you're unable to execute the infusion it means the recipe has been disabled in the config
info.forcecraft.book.ender.entry.name: Ender
info.forcecraft.book.ender_info.text: This infusion does the following:$(br)$(li)On a $(item)Force Rod$(): Will imbue the rod with Ender allowing it to be used as teleportation device$(br)$(li)On a $(item)Force Sword$(): Will add Ender to the sword causing you to be able to teleport to a targeted spot
info.forcecraft.book.ender_info.text2: $(li)On a $(item)Force Bow$(): will imbue any projectile fired by the bow, causing enemies to teleport to a random location
info.forcecraft.book.sturdy.entry.name: Sturdy
info.forcecraft.book.sturdy_info.text: This infusion does the following:$(br)$(li)On $(item)Force Tools$() (Max lvl: 3): will imbue with the vanilla Unbreaking enchantment$(br)$(li)On $(item)Force Armor$() (Max lvl: 1 per piece): Reduces damage from all sources for a total of 75%
info.forcecraft.book.tier_7.name: Tier 7 Infusions
info.forcecraft.book.tier_7.desc: Infusions that can be executed by having an $(item)Upgrade Tome$() of at least Tier 7
info.forcecraft.book.light.entry.name: Light
info.forcecraft.book.light_info.text: This infusion does the following:$(br)$(li)On a $(item)Force Rod$() (Max lvl: 1): Will imbue the rod with Light, allowing you to make the enemy glow (The effect can be removed by drinking milk)
info.forcecraft.book.treasure.entry.name: Treasure
info.forcecraft.book.treasure_info.text: This infusion does the following:$(br)$(li)On a $(item)Force Sword$(): will imbue the sword with the 'treasure' property causing slain mobs to drop a $(item)Spoils Bag$()$(br)$(li)On a $(item)Force Axe$(): will imbue the axe with the 'treasure' property causing slain mobs to drop $(item)Cards$() which can be crafted into a $(item)Spoils Bag$()
